channel.title: CVE Feed for OFFIS -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OFFIS -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-28130|2024-08-02T00:48:49.150Z -- offis -- dcmtk
item.description: An incorrect type conversion vulnerability exists in the DVPSSoftcopyVOI_PList::createFromImage functionality of OFFIS DCMTK 3.6.8. A specially crafted malformed file can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28130|2024-06-04T18:03:51.021Z -- offis -- dcmtk
item.description: An incorrect type conversion vulnerability exists in the DVPSSoftcopyVOI_PList::createFromImage functionality of OFFIS DCMTK 3.6.8. A specially crafted malformed file can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
